original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena sattarasavaggiyā bhikkhū aciravatiyā nadiyā udake kīḷanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena sattarasavaggiyāḥ bhikkhū aciravatiyāḥ nadiyāḥ udake kīḷanti

original: Tena kho pana samayena rājā pasenadi kosalo mallikāya deviyā saddhiṁ uparipāsādavaragato hoti.
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena rājā pasenadi kosalaḥ mallikāya deviyā saddhim upari pāsāda vara gataḥ hoti

original: Addasā kho rājā pasenadi kosalo sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū aciravatiyā nadiyā udake kīḷante.

original: Atha kho rañño pasenadissa kosalassa etadahosi—
analyzed: atha kho raññaḥ pasenadissa kosalassa etat ahosi

original: “kena nu kho ahaṁ upāyena bhagavato ca na āroceyyaṁ, bhagavā ca jāneyya ime bhikkhū udake kīḷitā”ti?

original: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū pakkosāpetvā mahantaṁ guḷapiṇḍaṁ adāsi—
analyzed: atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalaḥ sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū pakkosāpetvā mahantam guḷa piṇḍam adāsi

original: Sattarasavaggiyā bhikkhū taṁ guḷapiṇḍaṁ ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
analyzed: sattarasavaggiyāḥ bhikkhū tam guḷa piṇḍam ādāya yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu

original: “imaṁ, bhante, guḷapiṇḍaṁ rājā pasenadi kosalo bhagavato detī”ti.
